mapper.insert: insert into workflow_event (event_id, graph_id, cur_node_id, event_owner, cur_operator, begin_date ) select #{event.eventId}, t2.graph_id, t3.target_node, t3.target_node, #{event.curOperator}, #{event.beginDate} from workflow_def_graph_business_rel t1,workflow_def_graph t2,workflow_def_edge t3 where t1.graph_id = t2.graph_id and t2.root_node = t3.source_node and t1.business_id = #{businessId}
mapper.select:
SELECT T.ORDER_ID orderId, T1.BUSINESS_ID businessId, T7.event_id eventId, T3.CUSTOM_NAME customName, T3.WANGWANG_ACCNT wangwangAccnt, T2.COMPANY_NAME companyName, T2.COMPANY_ID companyId, T2.CITY city, T2.DISTRICT district, T1.REMARK remark, T3.WEIXIN_NAME weixinName, T4.BUSINESS_NAME businessName, DATEDIFF(NOW(),T5.BEGIN_DATE) cost, DATEDIFF(T5.END_DATE,NOW()) maxLeftDay, T1.BUSINESS_TAG businessTag, T1.CREATE_DATE createDate, T3.CUSTOM_LEVEL customLevel, T8.name curNodeName, T8.node_id curNodeId, T7.cur_operator_name curOperatorName FROM crm.CRM_CUSTOM_ORDER_INFO T, crm.CRM_ORDER_BUSINESS_REL T1, crm.CRM_COMPANY_INFO T2, crm.CRM_CUSTOM_BASIC_INFO T3, crm.CRM_BUSINESS_DICT T4, crm.CRM_COMPANY_BUSINESS T5, work_flow.workflow_def_graph_business_rel T6, work_flow.workflow_event T7, work_flow.workflow_def_node T8
T.ORDER_ID = T1.ORDER_ID AND T1.COMPANY_ID = T2.COMPANY_ID AND T.CUSTOM_ID = T3.CUSTOM_ID AND T1.BUSINESS_ID = T4.BUSINESS_ID AND T1.BUSINESS_ID = T5.BUSINESS_ID AND T1.BUSINESS_ID = T6.business_id AND T7.cur_node_id = T8.node_id AND not exists(select 1 from work_flow.workflow_event_dependency T9 where T7.event_id = T9.next_event) AND (T7.event_owner = #{query.userId} or T7.cur_operator = #{query.userId})
and T2.CITY like concat('%', #{query.city}, '%')
and T2.DISTRICT like concat('%', #{query.district}, '%')
and T2.COMPANY_NAME like concat('%', #{query.companyName}, '%')
and T3.CUSTOM_NAME like concat('%', #{query.customName}, '%')
and T3.CUSTOM_LEVEL like concat('%', #{query.customLevel}, '%')
and T8.name like concat('%', #{query.curNodeName}, '%')
and T3.WEIXIN_NAME like concat('%', #{query.weixinName}, '%')
and DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_DATE,'%Y%m%d') = #{query.createDate}
and T4.BUSINESS_NAME like concat('%', #{query.businessName}, '%')
and T1.BUSINESS_TAG like concat('%', #{query.businessTag}, '%')

SELECT T.ORDER_ID orderId, T1.BUSINESS_ID businessId, T7.event_id eventId, T3.CUSTOM_NAME customName, T3.WANGWANG_ACCNT wangwangAccnt, T2.COMPANY_NAME companyName, T2.COMPANY_ID companyId, T2.CITY city, T2.DISTRICT district, T1.REMARK remark, T3.WEIXIN_NAME weixinName, T4.BUSINESS_NAME businessName, DATEDIFF(NOW(),T5.BEGIN_DATE) cost, DATEDIFF(T5.END_DATE,NOW()) maxLeftDay, T1.BUSINESS_TAG businessTag, T1.CREATE_DATE createDate, T3.CUSTOM_LEVEL customLevel, T8.name curNodeName, T8.node_id curNodeId, T7.cur_operator_name curOperatorName FROM crm.CRM_CUSTOM_ORDER_INFO T, crm.CRM_ORDER_BUSINESS_REL T1, crm.CRM_COMPANY_INFO T2, crm.CRM_CUSTOM_BASIC_INFO T3, crm.CRM_BUSINESS_DICT T4, crm.CRM_COMPANY_BUSINESS T5, work_flow.workflow_def_graph_business_rel T6, work_flow.workflow_event T7, work_flow.workflow_def_node T8
T.ORDER_ID = T1.ORDER_ID AND T1.COMPANY_ID = T2.COMPANY_ID AND T.CUSTOM_ID = T3.CUSTOM_ID AND T1.BUSINESS_ID = T4.BUSINESS_ID AND T1.BUSINESS_ID = T5.BUSINESS_ID AND T1.BUSINESS_ID = T6.business_id AND T7.cur_node_id = T8.node_id AND not exists(select 1 from work_flow.workflow_event_dependency T9 where T7.event_id = T9.next_event)
and T2.CITY like concat('%', #{query.city}, '%')
and T2.DISTRICT like concat('%', #{query.district}, '%')
and T2.COMPANY_NAME like concat('%', #{query.companyName}, '%')
and T3.CUSTOM_NAME like concat('%', #{query.customName}, '%')
and T3.CUSTOM_LEVEL like concat('%', #{query.customLevel}, '%')
and T8.name like concat('%', #{query.curNodeName}, '%')
